Package eu.tivian.hardware

Custom chips implementation and chip communication providers.
Author:
Pawe≈Ç Kania
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CPU
    A basic CPU interface.
    MOS8501.AddressingMode
    Functor used for decoding the instructions.
    MOS8501.Operation
    Functor used for executing the instructions.
    TED.Video
    Rendering functional interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bus
    An implementation of collection of pins.
    BusTest
    Test suite for the bus.
    Connector
    An implementation of the electrical connector.
    ConnectorTest
    Test suite for connectors.
    Keyboard
    Keyboard matrix.
    KeyboardTest
    Test suite for keyboard matrix.
    Memory
    Fundamental memory class.
    MonostableTimer
    Mono-stable operating of NE555 timer.
    MonostableTimerTest
    Test suite for mono-stable operating NE555 timer.
    MOS8501
    An implementation of MOS8501 - the 8-bit CPU from 1985 used in the Commodore 16.
    MOS8501Test
    CPU test suite.
    Motherboard
    Motherboard of the Commodore 16.
    Pin
    An implementation of an actual IC pin.
    Pin.Ground
    Inner private class for ground pin.
    Pin.Power
    Inner private class for power pin.
    PinTest
    Test suit for pin.
    PLA
    Programmable logic array.
    PLATest
    Test suite for PLA chip.
    RAM
    RAM chip, based on TMS4416 used in C16.
    RAMTest
    Test suite for the RAM chip.
    ROM
    ROM chip, based on CSG23128 used in C16.
    ROMTest
    Test suite for the ROM chip.
    Switch
    An implementation of a mechanical switch.
    SwitchTest
    Test suite for switches.
    SystemClock
    Main clock generator.
    TED
    TED - video chip.
    TEDNative
    JNI bridge to Verilog version of TED.
    Wire
    An implementation of copper wire or PCB trace.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Connector.Gender
    Gender of the connector.
    MOS8501.Stage
    Possible stages of instruction execution.
    Pin.Direction
    Direction of the pin.
    Pin.Level
    Logic levels.
    RAM.State
    Internal state of the RAM chip.
